Microsoft has promised shareholders that Windows 10 would reach 1 billion users within three years, which would be its fastest adoption rate ever. Within the first 24 hours of the July 29 release, 14 million devices were running the operating system. 
Chief Executive Officer Satya Nadella has said the revenue bump from the new OS will come mostly two quarters from now.
